content:
TITLE: Building and Testing Program Commands
DESCRIPTION: Set of commands for building, testing, formatting and linting the Solana program implementation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm programs:build
pnpm programs:test
pnpm programs:format
pnpm programs:lint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Program IDLs and Clients
DESCRIPTION: Commands for generating Interface Description Language (IDL) files and client implementations for the program.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm generate:idls
pnpm generate:clients
pnpm generate
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Local Validator Management Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for starting, stopping and restarting a local Solana validator for development and testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm validator:start
pnpm validator:restart
pnpm validator:stop
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Testing JavaScript Client from Repository Root
DESCRIPTION: Command to build and test the JavaScript client from the root of the repository. This starts a new local validator if one is not already running and runs the client tests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/clients/js/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm clients:js:test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Testing Solana Memo Rust Client with pnpm
DESCRIPTION: Command to build and test the Rust client for the Solana Memo program. This command starts a local validator if one is not already running and executes the tests for the Rust client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/clients/rust/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm clients:js:test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Manual Validator Setup and Test Execution
DESCRIPTION: Series of commands for manually building programs, starting the validator, and running tests directly from the client directory. This approach provides more granular control over the test environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/clients/js/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
# Build your programs and start the validator.
pnpm programs:build
pnpm validator:restart

# Go into the client directory and run the tests.
cd clients/js
pnpm install
pnpm build
pnpm test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Linting and Formatting Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for maintaining code quality through linting and formatting the JavaScript client. Includes options for both checking and automatically fixing issues.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/clients/js/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm lint
pnpm lint:fix
pnpm format
pnpm format:fix
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install NPM dependencies required for accessing project scripts and tools.
SOURCE: https://github.com/solana-program/memo/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```
